name: SPAEC GAEM
description:
Crazy progressive roguelike 2D arcade space shooter on the night*

Prototype for the LibGDX jam.


* Might not be crazy or progressive or roguelike or 2D or arcade or space shooter

INSTRUCTIONS
  1. Do not die
  2. Only one life
  3. Get orbs
  4. Orbs have three colours
  5. Specials uses orbs
  6. No orbs, no special
  7. Bring your own good luck
INPUT
Xbox 360 gamepad (Recommended)
  • STICK: Move
  • RT: Shoot
  • LB: Special
  • X / B: Choose level up skill (Left / Right)
Keyboard + Mouse
  • RIGHT CLICK: Move
  • LEFT CLICK: Shoot
  • SPACE (KEYBOARD): Special
  • 1 / 2: Choose level up skill (Left / Right)
